workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.09316561551610164 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.1712595216498185 --weight-decay 0.0003807105435648245 --lr 4.290157490768411e-05 --lr-scheduler inverse_sqrt --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --min-lr 1e-9 --warmup-updates 163348 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.11010210957080764 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
